com.mockrunner.example.ejb

Class UserEntityBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mockrunner.example.ejb.UserEntityBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, javax.ejb.EntityBean

    public class UserEntityBean
extends Object
implements javax.ejb.EntityBean
    Implementation of a BMP entity bean representing a user with a username and a password.
